import numpy as np
def filter(ins,outs): cls = ins['Classification']
keep_classes = [1,2]
# Use the first test for our base array. keep = np.equal(cls, keep_classes[0])
# For 1:n, test each predicate and join back # to our existing predicate array for k in range(1,len(keep_classes)): t = np.equal(cls, keep_classes[k]) keep = keep + t
outs['Mask'] = keep return True
